summary: The email announces a Call for Papers (CfP) for the 18th IFIP WG8.1 Working Conference on the Practice of Enterprise Modeling (PoEM 2025). It is sent by the SEWORLD Moderator and includes a reminder for contributions to SEWORLD. The original message contains a note apologizing for cross-postings and provides a contact email for submissions, along with a link to the SEWORLD archive.
